name: Super Maxi-Pad Girl #5
description:
Aunt Flow is visiting The Period, but where is her husband? That's what The Period wants to find out. By hiring Seezajaz and his new sidekick Clancy, you can be sure The Period will get what he wants. 

Also, the League of Feminine Products (decked out in their new superhero outfits) set out to rescue Eco-Pad from a nefarious new villain. But where is Super Maxi-Pad Girl? Oh, she's just been kidnapped by The Period's symptoms, who have all seemed to go AWOL. And just what the heck is Excyke? 

This is the second installment of the four issue story arc entitled "Blood is Thicker..."

Story and Art: Daniel J. Olson
Co-writers: AJ Niehaus, Danno Klonowski

24 pages – B/W – May 2013
Saddle stitch – 6.625 x 10.25

name: Super Maxi-Pad Girl #4
description:
Things have been so slow at The League of Feminine Products headquarters that Super Maxi-Pad Girl decides to finally go on her book tour. As luck would have it, disaster strikes when Eco-Pad gets captured by a new nefarious villain, and SMPG is nowhere to be found! 

This is the first installment of the four issue story arc entitled "Blood is Thicker..."

Story and Art: Daniel J. Olson
Co-writers: AJ Niehaus, Danno Klonowski

24 pages – B/W – March 2011
Saddle stitch – 6.625 x 10.25

name: Super Maxi-Pad Girl #3
description:
Super Maxi-Pad Girl returns with three more stories that are sure to entertain and delight her fans. Guest writer Danno Klonowski gives us “Year After Fifty,” an eight page story of Super Maxi-Pad Girl in a not-so-distant dystopian future. “It’s Just What Bros Do” follows Pidol and Mamprin in their first solo story about what it means to practice teamwork. Lastly, “The Red Dot Era” concludes with even more of Super Maxi-Pad Girl’s ancestors joining the fray against the “Infinite Pact of the Natural Order.”

Story and Art: Daniel J. Olson
Co-writers: AJ Niehaus, Danno Klonowski

24 pages – B/W – April 2010
Saddle stitch – 6.625 x 10.25

name: Super Maxi-Pad Girl #2
description:
Super Maxi-Pad Girl and The League of Feminine Products pick up right where they left off as they battle the Period and its cronies in three short stories “The Rise of Seezajaz,” “9 Months and Counting,” and “The Red Dot Era.” Plus, you had questions and they have been answered! The incorrigible Period answers fan mail! Be sure to check out all of the other Super Maxi-Pad Girl related merchandise as well!

Story and Art: Daniel J. Olson
Co-writer: AJ Niehaus

24 pages – B/W – September 2009
Saddle stitch – 6.625 x 10.25

name: Super Maxi-Pad Girl #1
description:
It’s a bird, it’s a plane, it’s a Maxi-pad? Join Super Maxi-Pad Girl as she teams with Pidol, Mamprin, the rest of the League of Feminine products, and Thor to do battle with her arch-nemesis, The Period! Packed with three stories and a one-page “not-so-secret” origin story, these are tales not to be missed!

Story and Art: Daniel J. Olson
Co-writer: AJ Niehaus 

24 pages – B/W – October 2008
Saddle stitch – 6.625 x 10.25
